statements: DELETE FROM RoutePlanning WHERE transportation_mode = 'car' AND traffic_conditions = 'heavy';
DELETE FROM RoutePlanning WHERE id = 1 AND start_location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM RoutePlanning WHERE distance > 100 AND traffic_conditions = 'Heavy Traffic'
DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE route_id = 1 AND congestion > 0.5;
DELETE FROM Routes WHERE origin = 'New York' AND traffic_level = 'high';
DELETE FROM Routes WHERE origin='New York' AND destination='Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE total_cost > 1000 AND expense_date < '2022-01-01';
